Title: VDI Viewer
ExitMassage: Are you sure you want to shutdown?
Message_Input_IP: Please enter the correct Host IP.
Message_Input_User_PW: Login failed. The Username or Password is incorrect!
Message_Input_ALL: Please enter the correct Host IP, Username and Password.
Message_Error_User_PW: Please enter the correct Username and Password.
Message_Correct_OPW: Please re-enter the correct Original Password.
Message_Error_NPW_CPW: New Password and Confirm New Password, Error!
Message_Correct_NPW_CPW: Please re-enter the New Password and Confirm the New Password.
Message_VD_Online: The VD is online, do you still want to connect? if you connect it then the previous one will be disconnected automatically.
Message_Error_IP_01: Login failed, it may be the host IP format error!
Message_Error_IP_02: Please check the network to verify if it is connected.
Message_Error_IP_03: Please enter the correct Host IP, or
Message_Error_404: Login failed. This IP may not be AcroRed Host IP!
Message_Error_IP_04: Please make sure that the IP you entered is correct.
Message_Error_IP_403: Please ask support from System Administrator.
Message_Error_IP_05: If you have entered the correct IP, please ask support from System Administrator.
Message_Error_IP_06: Login failed, it may be that the Host IP does not exist, or the network has been disconnected!
Message_Error_IP_07: Please enter the correct Host IP.
Message_Error_VM_IP_01: Can not enter VD Management, it may be the host IP format error!
Message_Error_VM_IP_02: Can not enter VD Management, it may be that the Host IP does not exist, or the network has been disconnected!
Message_Error_VM_IP_404: Can not enter VD Management. This IP may not be AcroRed Host IP!
Message_Error_VM_IP_401: Can not enter VD Management. The Username or Password is incorrect!
Message_Error_VM_IP_403: Can not enter VD Management. User is Locked!
Message_Error_CP_IP_01: Can not enter Change Password, it may be the host IP format error!
Message_Error_CP_IP_02: Can not enter Change Password, it may be that the Host IP does not exist, or the network has been disconnected!
Message_Error_CP_IP_404: Can not enter Change Password. This IP may not be AcroRed Host IP!
Message_Error_CP_IP_401: Can not enter Change Password. The Username or Password is incorrect!
Message_Error_CP_IP_403: Can not enter Change Password. User is Locked!
Message_Error_VD_410: Login failed, VD server not available!
RebootMassage: Are you sure you want to restart?
Message_Error_setVDonline: The server IP can not connect!
TC_Check_Error_IP: Can not Check new version, it may be the host IP format error!
TC_Check_Error: Can not Check new version, it may be that the Host IP does not exist, or the network has been disconnected!
TC_Update_Suggest: When the update is complete, it will automatically reboot, are you sure you want to update?
